column4: is there a page on configuring 802.1g wirless card for ubuntu does not seem even to see it when i check network configuration
is the card supported by the Linux kernel?
it runs perfect on mepis i used the live cd
mepis isn't Ubuntu. Did you check which driver mepis uses for it? Did you check if you have that driver installed?
What was in it? Just the windows one?
You can add that partiton into the grub menu
Check the grub examples, then add an entry for that aprtition (it's DOS or FreeDOS)
There isn't really one for Linux.
Just run 'dpkg-buildpackage -b', it will be fine.
just needed to know simple answer are deb rules diif then ubuntu and can i use use dh_make?
They're not normally different as far as I know.
There is a userid matching extension in iptables.
